titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Pigment Green 7 Crude, not ready for use as a pigment.
To suspend temporarily the duty on Pigment Green 7 Crude, not ready for use as a pigment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Copper Phthalocyanine Green 7 Crude (Pigment Green 7 Crude, not ready for use as a pigment).
